here.

It is like the Crunchy bar but this is better.

If you're in Germany traveling and you want

of a Euro.

A little history into this chocolate bar - as
you can see it is square shape because it

was actually meant to fit inside of a gentleman's
blazer inside the front pocket.

If they were ever at the theater - or the
